message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm not budging!
I'll give you a better deal, but don't expect me to go any further!
You're getting desperate, take the crumbs!
I'm willing to compromise, but don't think I'll go any lower!
You're getting close to starving, take the tiny slice!
I'm almost out of patience, but I'll give you one more chance!
You're almost out of options, take the last crumb!
I'm out of patience and out of offers. You win, Bob. Take it all.
